name: outro
commands: Guys look! There's a tome sitting on top of a weird pillar.|Is this the....
This page...|These notes are new...|Somebody has been reading and adjusting the spells.
Hold on, what do you mean someone's been adjusting the spells?
I believe I said previously,|this tome was the last of the weapons used in the founding wars.
The war that eradicated the monsters and slayed the demon king correct?

Yes. It's taught in history today that the Lithrasir was among the founder's set of weapons.|This is not true.|The Lithrasir is a collection of the Demon King's own powers sealed away into a book.|It radiates the same energy of the demon king.|My br-|Orkney,one of the founders,|used light magic to counter the dark energy and wield this tome safely.|With the addition of the demon king's own powers, the founders were able to turn the tides.
Wait...then someone has been modifying the demon king's powers?
You catch on quick.|These notes speak of a ritual involving the Argon Chalice|Using this as a catalyst, they can create a vessel that is immune to the counter the founders created.
...The demon king...|They'll surely try to summon the demon king.
Yes...we cannot allow this ritual to succeed.|We must revive the counteractive power these weapons held,|and then immediately send you 3 off to interupt the ritual.
How could Lord Rikard have allowed Lilith not only access to Lithrasir,|but enough access to research?
I have come with a deal.
Good...I am here today to make a deal.|One that you surely would not refuse.|Your wife died recently due to an illness...
You have 10 seconds before I order your execution.
Are you not aware that the Lithrasir was used to resurrect  ____?

Why do you think that he's been around so long?|Yet all he's been asking of you was the return of the Lithrasir as the caretaker...|As one of the only dark magic users alive in this kingdom,|I believe I would be the only one willing to return you your beloved wife
The barrier around the castle...|The book itself casted it.

...|Before Orkney died, he imbued a portion of his soul within the tome to prevent future users from using it.|For a time... it worked and his image could stop someone from casting its spells.|One day... his image stopped appearing.|...Perhaps Orkney's soul tried to fight back against Lilith but it let to this...
So this book has a mind of its own? Capable of casting its own spells?
Aesc...|What if I use the book?
You can't be serious!|We just established this book has a crazy mind of its own and you want to use it?|This is more likely to blow up in our face rather than save our necks!
{var:MC_name} this book is infamous for causing every user after Orkney to go mad.|Even if this tome has incredible power, it can't be worth this risk!
Orkney was able to use the book safely right?|It was the difference maker for the founders.|It might be the only way we can beat Lilith.
Aesc, please tell {var:MC_name} that this is a bad idea.
It's an insane gamble.|But {var:MC_name}'s light magic could make him uniquely able to use it.|At least for a limited time.

Boy...|Think carefully about this.|If you take this book,|and something goes terribly wrong for you and Schuri and Senya.|This book will take control of you.|Are you willing to take that massive risk?
Senya and Schuri are concerned that you took the tome -1 both
I think it's worth the risk. We can use the power to defeat that necromancer.|They were stronger than Teach, so any power would be welcome.
{var:MC_name}...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
The second this book makes you feel strange, you drop it ok?
Oh thank the Spirits.|For a split second I thought that creepy book would have to come with us.
That's a relief! There's no need for such a risk.
Senya and Schuri are relieved that you didn't take the tome +1 both
This tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.|We prefer not to take the risk.
Likely for the best.|Seeing that you're not taking that book, I feel safer loaning you my Ivaldi.|It may not be as strong as the Lithrasir but I have no doubt it will serve you well
Now that all the founders weapons and the Lithrasir is here,|I can repower up the weapons to their original might.
Get some rest for now, I'm going to prepare a warping spell to the castle.
